item.title: Writing Takahē Article for gihyo.jp
item.author: shuuji3@gmail.com (TAKAHASHI Shuuji)
item.description: This is just a really brief note. It’s already a half year ago, but I had an opportunity to write two long articles about Takahē in Japanese on the website gihyo.jp, managed by Gijutsu-Hyoron Co., Ltd. (技術評論社), one of famous technical book publishers in Japan: 情報発信に便利で軽量なActivityPubサーバー「Takahē」［前編］ ～特徴（マルチドメインサポート）の紹介と、クライアントアプリElkからの利用 | gihyo.jp - https://gihyo.jp/article/2023/09/takahe-01 情報発信に便利で軽量なActivityPubサーバー「Takahē」［後編］ ～基本的なアーキテクチャと特徴的なコンポーネントの紹介と、サーバーの構築方法 | gihyo.jp - https://gihyo.jp/article/2023/09/takahe-02 where I introduced Takahē’s features and the overview of ActivityPub/Fediverse. I also presented its interesting components and libraries as well as the server usage with Mastodon Client Elk.
